net.grabsalot.gui

Class MainFrame

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Frame
            • javax.swing.JFrame
              • net.grabsalot.gui.MainFrame
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants, LocalizableComponent

    public final class MainFrame
extends javax.swing.JFrame
implements LocalizableComponent
    The main frame for the application. This frame is the most important, as if it is closed the application closes also.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        public MainFrame(WorkingMode workingMode,

        The recommended constructor. All components are added to the frame here.
        Parameters:
        workingMode - an integer representing the processing method.
        path - a path to an existing directory, that server as the root for processing
